casebody.data:
Mary Reynard LANE and John Lane, as Executors of the Estate of George E. Lane, Deceased, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. The C. G. BLAKE COMPANY, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 169. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 6, 1939. John Lane, of New York City, for appellants. Allan R. Campbell, of White Plains, N. Y., for appellee.

Before SWAN, CHASE, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
